verses.english: When Allah’s ˹ultimate˺ help comes and the victory ˹over Mecca is achieved˺,

verses.arabic: وَرَأَيْتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِى دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا
verses.english: and you ˹O Prophet˺ see the people embracing Allah’s Way in crowds,

verses.arabic: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسْتَغْفِرْهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابًۢا
verses.english: then glorify the praises of your Lord and seek His forgiveness, for certainly He is ever Accepting of Repentance.
